message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's a fantastic deal at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking $90 would be a more comfortable price for me.
I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. How about we meet at $105?
I'm not getting any younger, and I'm starting to think about my budget. I'm willing to go up to $95, but that's as high as I can go.
I understand you're on a tight budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so how about we meet at $108?
I'm really liking the product, but $108 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $92, but that's my final offer.
I'm not willing to go as low as $92, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'll meet you in the middle at $100, but that's as low as I can go
I've thought about it a lot, and I'm really not willing to pay more than $90. It's the best I can do. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to walk away.
